subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The former 49er Adam Snyder, a versatile offensive lineman, joined the Giants on Wednesday as guard Geoff Schwartz, an off-season acquisition, was put on an injured reserve list.
snippet: The former 49er Adam Snyder, a versatile offensive lineman, joined the Giants on Wednesday as guard Geoff Schwartz, an off-season acquisition, was put on an injured reserve list.
